brief-global gardens group signs exclusive international distribution agreement

text: 10 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Global Gardens Group Signs Exclusive International Distribution Agreement​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Global Gardens Group Inc: * GLOBAL GARDENS GROUP INC - ‍ ARRIVAL OF “VEGGEMO” PRODUCT LINE INTO BERMUDA; HAS AN EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT IN PLACE WITH “LIVE PLUS BERMUDA.”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
